EmailTemplate.subject: Registration confirmation: Australia Post VOI for Property Transfers - {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for completing the online registration form for the Australia Post Verification of Identity (VOI) service for Property Transfers. To finalise your registration please print, sign and return a copy of the attached VOI (Property Transfers) Referral Agreement:
Via email to:
LandTitleVOI@auspost.com.au
Or via post to:
Property Transfers VOI
Reply Paid 4310
Adelaide SA 5001
Once we have received your signed agreement we will send you your customised Property Transfers VOI form and instructions on how to access reports generated by our service. The form needs to be presented by your clients at participating Post Offices (auspost.com.au/find/landtitle) in order for them to have their identity verified by Australia Post.
If you require any assistance please contact us via email LandTitleVOI@auspost.com.au or call us on 1300 364 543.
Kind regards,
Australia Post Property Transfers VOI team
